code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input  logic [99:0] in,               // 100-bit input vector
    output logic [99:0] out_both,         // 100-bit output indicating both neighbors are '1'
    output logic [99:0] out_any,          // 100-bit output indicating any neighbor is '1'
    output logic [99:0] out_different      // 100-bit output indicating differing neighbors
);

always @(*) begin
    out_both[99] = 1'b0; // No left neighbor for in[99]
    for (int i = 0; i < 99; i++) begin
        out_both[i] = in[i] & in[i+1]; // Both current and left neighbor are '1'
    end

    out_any[0] = 1'b0; // No right neighbor for in[0]
    for (int i = 1; i < 100; i++) begin
        out_any[i] = in[i] | in[i-1]; // Any current or right neighbor is '1'
    end

    out_different[99] = (in[99] != in[0]); // Wrap around check
    for (int i = 0; i < 99; i++) begin
        out_different[i] = (in[i] != in[i+1]); // Check if current differs from left neighbor
    end
end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

iterations.code:
module TopModule (
    input  logic [99:0] in,               // 100-bit input vector
    output logic [99:0] out_both,         // 100-bit output indicating both neighbors are '1'
    output logic [99:0] out_any,          // 100-bit output indicating any neighbor is '1'
    output logic [99:0] out_different      // 100-bit output indicating differing neighbors
);

assign out_both[99] = 1'b0; // No left neighbor for in[99]
generate
    genvar i;
    for (i = 0; i < 99; i = i + 1) begin : gen_out_both
        assign out_both[i] = in[i] & in[i+1]; // Both current and left neighbor are '1'
    end
endgenerate

assign out_any[0] = 1'b0; // No right neighbor for in[0]
generate
    for (i = 1; i < 100; i = i + 1) begin : gen_out_any
        assign out_any[i] = in[i] | in[i-1]; // Any current or right neighbor is '1'
    end
endgenerate

assign out_different[99] = (in[99] != in[0]); // Wrap around check
generate
    for (i = 0; i < 99; i = i + 1) begin : gen_out_different
        assign out_different[i] = (in[i] != in[i+1]); // Check if current differs from left neighbor
    end
endgenerate

endmodule
